text: 15.10 Mat 11.30, 23.4, Luk 11.46, Gal 3.10, 5.1 God kɨlop pɨsnep dup anɨb ak, nɨbi taynen God chɨnop tay gɨnɨmuŋ agɨl nebneb gɨlɨg apɨm agak? Nɨbi apɨm, Mosis takaw sɨkol agak agak tek ma gɨnɨgabal ak, God kɨlop ma dɨnɨgab apɨm agak. Asɨk mosɨk gɨtep gɨnɨgel apɨm anɨb ak, apɨs based sɨkop gɨ mel nɨgɨlak agak. Chɨn abe gɨ mel nopun ak pen, nɨbi tepayaŋ apɨm agak.
